1. What’s Ray’s problem? Why is he so unhappy? 
 Ray is unhappy because he lives in conflict with his _________
 . He feels disconnected from his Higher Self.
2. True or False: The Sun is controlling, overbearing and robs Ray of the freedom to be himself.
3. True or False: We are all rays of the Sun. He is the Soul of our soul. We exist as a part of Him; not apart from Him.

4. According to Doc, rays of light are more wholly [completely] themselves when they are in service of the Sun. Why? 
 True or False: Because we are simply being who we are. All the Sun really asks of us is to be ourselves.
5. True or False: Ray has to give up what he wants and do what the Sun wants. Service is oppression not self-expression.
6. According to Doc how does the Sun become present on earth? The brilliance, warmth and vitality of the Sun is channeled into the world through...
7. Why would Ray be happier if he lived life in service of the Sun?
answers: Because the sun would reward him
Because he would know he would have a great afterlife
Becasue the sun would protect him
Because he is living up to his true self
correct: Because he is living up to his true self
